name: podcast-manager
description: Podcast management platform for guests, episodes, and digital assets

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev -w server" "npm run dev -w client"
scripts.build: npm run build -w server && npm run build -w client
scripts.test: npm run test -w server && npm run test -w client
scripts.lint: npm run lint -w server && npm run lint -w client
